infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to show nearby movie theaters and events.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to contacts to help you find friends who might be interested in the same movies.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to scan QR codes and take photos for movie reviews.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to calendar to help you schedule movie watching events and reminders.
